details.subtitle: Learn how to write applications! Programming in practice!
details.description: This course is designed for beginners who want to understand the fundamentals of C# programming, with a focus on practical application development.
objectivesSummary: Understand the basics of C# programming

details.subtitle: Start learning German from scratch
details.description: This course offers a beginner-friendly introduction to German language, covering grammar, vocabulary, and everyday communication.

details.subtitle: Explore AI and machine learning concepts
details.description: This course introduces basic concepts in artificial intelligence and machine learning, perfect for anyone looking to understand AI technology.
mustKnowBefore: Basic understanding of algorithms (helpful, but not required)

title: Project Management with Agile and Scrum

details.subtitle: Master Agile and Scrum for project success
details.description: Learn how to effectively manage projects using Agile and Scrum methodologies. This course focuses on real-world application of these tools.
objectivesSummary: Improve team collaboration and project delivery

details.subtitle: Master algebra from the ground up
details.description: A course designed for anyone new to algebra or looking to reinforce their understanding of core algebraic concepts.
intendedFor: Anyone needing a refresher in algebra

details.subtitle: Unlock your inner storyteller
details.description: This course helps you explore the fundamentals of creative writing, from storytelling techniques to character creation.
intendedFor: Anyone looking to improve their writing

details.subtitle: Understand the basics of finance
details.description: This course covers key financial concepts tailored for non-financial professionals. Learn how to interpret financial statements and make informed business decisions.
objectivesSummary: Apply financial knowledge to business decisions

details.subtitle: Explore the diversity of global religions
details.description: This course offers an overview of the major world religions, their beliefs, practices, and impact on culture and society.
objectivesSummary: Gain knowledge of different religious traditions
Understand the historical context of religions
Explore the role of religion in modern societies

details.subtitle: Protect your systems and data
details.description: Learn the essential principles of cybersecurity, including how to safeguard digital assets and mitigate security risks.
objectivesSummary: Learn how to secure data and networks

details.subtitle: Dive into the laws of motion and forces
details.description: This course covers the foundational principles of classical mechanics, including Newton's laws, energy, and momentum.
objectivesSummary: Understand the fundamentals of classical mechanics
Apply Newton's laws to real-world scenarios
Explore concepts like energy and momentum
intendedFor: Anyone with an interest in classical mechanics
